1: 일이나 이야기의 내용 따위가 기이하여 표현하거나 규정하기 어렵다.
수완이나 재주 따위가 남달리 뛰어나거나 약빠르다.

0: A shape, movement, etc., being unusual and marvelous.
A happening, sentiment, etc., being too odd to be expressed.
A person's talent, skill, etc., being great.

1: 소식이나 행방 따위를 알 길이 없다.

0: Being in a state in which someone or something seems to move little by little because he/she/it is deep and far away.
Being unclear in one's memory because it is an incident of the past.
Not able to know one's whereabouts, news, etc.

2: 바다 따위가 넓고 끝이 없어 아득하다.
